snippet: Defense lawyers did not call any witnesses in the trial of 16 people accused of hate crimes involving cutting the hair of fellow Amish after prosecutors wrapped up their case on Tuesday.
abstract: Defense lawyers do not call any witnesses in the federal trial of 16 people accused of hate crimes involving cutting the hair of fellow Amish after prosecutors wrap up their case; defendants, who live in the Bergholz settlement in eastern Ohio, could face lengthy prison terms if convicted.
lead_paragraph: Defense lawyers did not call any witnesses in the trial of 16 people accused of hate crimes involving cutting the hair of fellow Amish after prosecutors wrapped up their case on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Ohio: Amish Make No Defense in Hate Crimes Case
